title: Function Concepts - Tabular and Analytic Part C

content.question: Part C (i) Based on the table, which of the following function types best models function \(f\): linear, quadratic, exponential, or logarithmic? (ii) Give a reason for your answer in part C(i) based on the relationship between the change in the output values of \(f\) and the change in the input values of \(f\). Refer to the values in the table in your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Part C (i) Based on the table, which of the following function types best models function \(f\): linear, quadratic, exponential, or logarithmic? (ii) Give a reason for your answer in part C(i) based on the relationship between the change in the output values of \(f\) and the change in the input values of \(f\). Refer to the values in the table in your reasoning.

topic.text: 1.13: Function Model Selection and Assumption Articulation

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
